DOC.HEADLINE: WE ' VE HEARD
DOC.TEXT: KROQ won ' t say yet , but a longtime station fave now using a one-word name will headline the June 11 " Weenie_Roast and Sing-a-Long. " Also on the bill : the Pretenders ( left ) , Beck , Violent Femmes and enough other acts to keep Irvine Meadows KROQ-ing all day . Tickets on sale Saturday .
